When attachment to the sphere of infinite space is not yet exhausted.

Being born in the desire realm or the Brahma world.

In the four formless concentrations that are free from defilements, there may be none, or one, two, three, or four.
None means when the craving for the desire realm is not yet exhausted.
One means when the craving for the desire realm is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
Two means when the craving for the Brahma heaven is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
Three means when the craving for the heaven of extreme radiance is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
Four means when the craving for the heaven of universal purity is exhausted.
In the four formless concentrations that are associated with enjoyment, there may be one, two, three, or four.
One means when the craving for the sphere of nothingness is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
Two means when the craving for the sphere of infinite consciousness is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
Three means when the craving for the sphere of infinite space is exhausted but the craving for higher realms is not yet exhausted.
The fourth is when the craving for the sphere of infinite space has not yet ended.

Two means that craving for the sphere of infinite space has been exhausted, but craving for higher realms has not yet been exhausted.
Three means that craving for the sphere of infinite consciousness has been exhausted.
